Title: Drew Brees mulling NFL retirement: Saints' Alvin Kamara says QB will 'take his time' making decision
Description: Kamara says everyone will simply have to wait, because Brees has earned that much. "As far as his career goes and retiring or playing still, a lot of people ask me that and I just say, 'Drew's going to take his time and make the best decision for him,
Author: CBSSports.com on MSN.com
